She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Project Management Methodologies: Agile, Scrum, and PMP


Agile

  • Agile is a flexible, iterative approach to project management that emphasizes collaboration, customer feedback, and the ability to adapt to change.

  • It is a set of principles and values that guide how teams work together to deliver projects.

  • Agile is often used in software development, but it can be applied to any type of project.


Scrum

  • Scrum is a specific Agile framework that provides a set of rules and practices for managing projects.

  • It is based on the idea of short, iterative cycles called sprints.

  • Scrum teams are typically small, cross-functional, and self-organizing.


PMP

  • PMP stands for Project Management Professional.

  • It is a globally recognized certification that demonstrates a person's knowledge and skills in project management.


Why Implementing Project Management Methodologies Is Important for Companies

  • Improved project planning and execution

  • Increased efficiency and productivity

  • Reduced costs and risks

  • Improved communication and collaboration

  • Increased customer satisfaction

  • Better ability to adapt to change


Why Developing Project Management Skills Is Important for Your Career

  • Increased earning potential

  • Improved job prospects

  • Greater career advancement opportunities

  • Enhanced professional credibility

  • Increased ability to contribute to organizational success

  • Improved leadership and teamwork skills


In addition to the above, here are some other reasons why developing project management skills is important for your career:

  • Project management skills are in high demand.

  • Project management skills are transferable across industries.

  • Project management skills can help you to be more successful in your current role.

  • Project management skills can help you to start your own business.

Agile  Agile is a flexible, iterative approach to project management that emphasizes collaboration, customer feedback, and the ability to adapt to change.  It is a set of principles and values that guide how teams work together to deliver projects.  Agile is often used in software development, but it can be applied to any type of project.

Scrum  Scrum is a specific Agile framework that provides a set of rules and practices for managing projects.  It is based on the idea of short, iterative cycles called sprints.  Scrum teams are typically small, cross-functional, and self-organizing.
PMP  PMP stands for Project Management Professional.  It is a globally recognized certification that demonstrates a person's knowledge and skills in project management.

Why Implementing Project Management Methodologies Is Important for Companies  Improved project planning and execution  Increased efficiency and productivity  Reduced costs and risks  Improved communication and collaboration  Increased customer satisfaction  Better ability to adapt to change

Why Developing Project Management Skills Is Important for Your Career  Increased earning potential  Improved job prospects  Greater career advancement opportunities  Enhanced professional credibility  Increased ability to contribute to organizational success  Improved leadership and teamwork skills

In addition to the above, here are some other reasons why developing project management skills is important for your career:  Project management skills are in high demand.  Project management skills are transferable across industries.  Project management skills can help you to be more successful in your current role.  Project management skills can help you to start your own business.

courseDetails.title: Cinematic AI: Directing Camera Shots with Nano Banana
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master AI Cinematography. Master Cinematic Shots, Angles, and Composition with Nano Banana. Learn to Direct AI.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the secrets of professional filmmaking and photography without ever touching a camera.

Have you ever been frustrated by generic, lifeless AI images? Do you have a clear cinematic vision in your head but struggle to bring it to life with simple keywords? This course is the solution. Welcome to Cinematic AI, the first-ever hands-on workshop that teaches you the art of cinematography by directing one of the world's most powerful AI image models: Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash, famously known as Nano Banana.

This is not a traditional film theory course. This is a practical, step-by-step masterclass where you will learn to think, act, and create like a professional director. We will work directly inside Google AI Studio, and for every single professional camera shot, angle, and composition, you will get a live, practical demonstration. You will learn to move beyond being a simple "prompter" and become a true AI Creative Director, capable of generating stunning, story-driven, and emotionally resonant images on command.

We will start with the fundamentals, introducing you to the revolutionary conversational editing power of the Nano Banana model. You'll learn where to find and use this tool, including free methods, before diving into the core of the course.

Throughout this journey, you will master the complete language of visual storytelling:

  • Foundation of Cinematic Shots: Go beyond "a picture of a person" and learn to direct the full spectrum of shot sizes. You'll generate epic Wide Shots to establish your world, conversational Medium Shots (including the classic Cowboy Shot) to capture the heart of the scene, and powerful Close-Up Shots to direct emotion with precision.

  • The Art of Cinematic Framing: Learn to compose your scenes like a pro. You'll master the Single Shot to build focus, the Two Shot to create character dynamics, and advanced techniques like the immersive Over-the-Shoulder and thrilling Point-of-View (POV) shots to pull your audience directly into the story.

  • Camera Angles & Perception: Discover how a simple change in perspective can completely alter the psychology of your image. You will direct Neutral & Grounded Angles for stability, create power dynamics with High-Angle and Low-Angle shots, and inject creative tension with stylistic choices like the Dutch Angle.

  • Mastering Focus to Guide Attention: Learn to control the most crucial element for directing the viewer's eye. You will simulate professional focus techniques, creating beautiful portraits with Shallow Focus (Bokeh) and vast, detailed landscapes with Deep Focus.

  • The AI Portrait Director's Workshop: In a special bonus section, you will put everything you've learned into practice. We will take a single, neutral portrait and, through a series of conversational edits, transform it by applying different shot sizes, angles, and narrative framing, proving you can direct a complete character study from a single starting point.

By the end of this course, you won't just understand the theory of cinematography—you will have a portfolio of beautifully directed, AI-generated images and the skills to create any visual story you can imagine.

Enroll now and learn to stop prompting and start directing!


What you'll learn


  • Master the "Director's Mindset" to write descriptive, narrative prompts that produce superior, cinematic AI images.

  • Generate over 15 distinct, professional camera shots and sizes, from the Extreme Wide Shot to the Extreme Close-Up.

  • Control and direct camera angles to shape audience perception, creating feelings of power, vulnerability, or unease.

  • Learn the art of cinematic framing and composition, including the Two Shot, Over-the-Shoulder, and Point-of-View (POV) shots.

  • Simulate professional focus techniques like Shallow Focus (Bokeh) and Deep Focus to guide the viewer's attention.

  • Gain hands-on experience using Google AI Studio with the Gemini 2.5 Flash (Nano Banana) model.

  • Understand the power of conversational editing to refine and perfect your images through simple, natural language.

  • Apply all learned techniques in a practical workshop to transform a simple portrait into a dynamic, story-rich character study.

Enroll now and learn to start directing with Nano Banana
targetAudiences: Aspiring Filmmakers and Directors who want to storyboard and pre-visualize their scenes.
Photographers looking to explore new creative styles and compositions.
Content Creators, YouTubers, and Social Media Managers who need high-quality, custom visuals.
Marketers and Advertisers who want to create compelling, on-brand campaign imagery
Graphic Designers and Artists looking to integrate powerful AI tools into their workflow.
Anyone curious about the future of AI image generation and visual storytelling.

courseDetails.title: AI Audio Editing Masterclass: Adobe Podcast for Pro Audio

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the AI Audio Editing Masterclass, your complete, step-by-step guide to mastering Adobe Podcast. This course will transform you from a complete beginner into a confident audio editor, capable of producing crystal-clear, professional audio using the incredible power of Artificial Intelligence.

Forget confusing waveforms and endless technical settings. In this course, we'll dive deep into the revolutionary workflow of text-based audio editing, where you'll learn to edit your audio as easily as editing a text document. You'll discover the 'magic' of Adobe's Enhance Speech tool to remove background noise and echo with a single click, making your voice sound like it was recorded in a professional studio—even if you're using a basic microphone in a noisy room!

What you'll learn in this course:

  • Master the complete Adobe Podcast workflow, from initial setup to final export.

  • Use the AI-powered Mic Check tool to perfect your audio setup before you record.

  • Record high-quality solo episodes directly in the Adobe Podcast Studio.

  • Revolutionize your editing process with Text-Based Audio Editing—edit your voice by simply editing text.

  • Magically clean up your audio by removing filler words ("ums," "ahs"), stumbles, and awkward pauses.

  • Add professional intros, outros, and background music from the integrated, royalty-free library.

  • Harness the incredible power of Enhance Speech to remove background noise and echo, transforming bad audio into pro-quality sound.

  • Enhance existing audio and even improve the sound from your video files.

  • Correct your transcript and learn how to repurpose it for blog posts, show notes, and improved SEO.

  • Export your final project in high-quality formats, ready for any platform.

A Journey from Beginner to Pro Audio Editor, Step-by-Step.

This course is designed as a hands-on journey. We'll start with the absolute basics and build your skills logically, with practical projects along the way.

  • First, we'll cover the Introduction to Adobe Podcast, getting you set up with your free account and comfortable with the platform.

  • You'll become a pro at setup by Mastering the Mic Check Tool, ensuring every recording starts with the best possible quality.

  • Next, we'll jump into the Power of Adobe Podcast Studio, where you'll get a full tour of the interface—the heart of AI audio editing—and record your first solo project.

  • The core of this course is The Revolution of Text-Based Editing. This is where you'll learn the game-changing workflow of cutting, restructuring, and polishing your audio by simply editing the AI-generated transcript. We'll even add music and sound effects to bring your project to life.

  • Prepare to be amazed in the section on Enhancing Your Audio Like a Pro. You'll master the incredible AI Enhanced Speech Tool, witnessing its power to transform unusable audio into unbelievable, studio-quality sound.

  • Finally, we'll cover Finalizing Your Project, teaching you how to export your finished audio in the highest quality, ready to share with the world.

Let's Edit Audio with AI powered Adobe Podcast. ENROLL NOW!!
